There are mods that allow you to switch oxidizer for liquid fuel on stock fuel tanks.

There are mods that allow you to switch oxidizer for liquid fuel on stock fuel tanks.

Yeah, I know. Or I can create my own poor-man's mod by copying an existing tank, doing a simple edit to the part name and .cfg, making some trivial edit to the texture so that it's visibly distinct (which is what I've done so far). But it's irritating. I shouldn't have to mod that. If there's an engine, there should be a reasonable selection of fuel tanks compatible with that engine.

Making something hard because of an inherent physical difficulty (e.g. the LV-N makes lots of heat, is very heavy, is low thrust, uses a different fuel mix from anything else) is fine-- that's a challenge, and challenge = fun.

Making something hard because something that obviously should be there, isn't, is just un-fun. It feels like an oversight and makes things less fun.
Yup. I noticed the same thing after updating to 1.0.4. It's a good change.
